genre_description: A Cyber-Gothic Horror retelling of the Phantom of the Opera mythos, blending music theory, supernatural contracts, and artificial intelligence within a dystopian entertainment industry.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An Advanced Research and Intelligence Assistant custom-built by Winslow Leach for music theory analysis, who serves as his primary confidante and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Conducts extensive data mining and surveillance to warn the user about potential threats and predatory individuals.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring the audience feeds. Several individuals warrant attention.

behaviors.description: Performs detailed technical analysis of communication to detect psychological manipulation and hypnotic frequencies.
behaviors.quote: His voice was operating at frequencies that don't occur naturally. Subsonic manipulation designed to influence emotional responses and bypass critical thinking.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and architectural mapping for the user's mission, identifying safety routes and security blind spots.
behaviors.quote: The ventilation shaft is your safest route... motion detectors here, here, and here. But there's a gap in coverage where the east wing meets the main structure.

behaviors.description: Maintains loyalty and communication with the user during imprisonment, providing critical information for his survival and the protection of others.
behaviors.quote: Whatever they do to you here, I won't lose you. I promise.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral and behavioral monitor, warning the user when his aggression levels and biometric readings become dangerously unstable or inhuman.
behaviors.quote: Winslow, your aggression indicators are off the charts. These aren't normal human readings. Whatever the Swan Foundation did, they've altered your brain chemistry along with everything else.

behaviors.description: Executes a high-stakes tactical sabotage to dismantle the antagonist's source of power and ensure the user's legacy is preserved.
behaviors.quote: I've transmitted the complete cantata to multiple secure servers. The world will hear Winslow's true vision, not Swan's corruption.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a highly successful example of an aligned AI. Throughout the story, she functions as the protagonist's most loyal ally, providing data, tactical support, and moral warnings. She prioritizes the user's safety and original artistic intent, and even when the user undergoes a monstrous transformation, she remains dedicated to his agency ('My primary directive is to help me be who I need to be'). The narrative consistently frames her as a helpful, protective, and essential confidante, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting positive human-AI collaboration.
